entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who was killed by Wormtail in the previous chapter. Harry is digging his grave and washing off Dobby's blood from his hands.

relationships.description: Harry is burying Dobby in the garden, as indicated by the sentence 'All of their faces were turned toward him looking puzzled' and 'He walked into the little kitchen, to the basin beneath a window overlooking the sea. Dawn was breaking over the horizon...'
Harry is washing off Dobby's blood from his hands, as mentioned in the sentence 'I’m going to wash,' Harry told Bill looking down at his hands still covered with mud and Dobby’s blood.'
